long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
iHS extension searches data on pages you visit. Auto search mode automates search for data on search elements.

Features:
* Extract values from visited pages
* Bypass obfuscation techniques (some of them)
* Auto copy lists
* Fetch prices for full category 
* Fetch data from RES page easy
* Copy branches names with one click
* Copy branches IDS with one click

How to use the extension:
- After installing the extension it just open RES page and click Fetch Data
- Same page click Cop All Branches will copy all IDS and same for names
- the advance menu will work in menu side only 
- press show QR to show the button on each branch 

Please note: iHS made with love to help the agents .
